title: Feature request for bufio: Reader.ReadString should take a string as an argument, instead of just one byte
body:
bufio.ReadString is a useful tool for parsing data. However, right now it
only supports reading up until a byte, which is constraining. It would be
awesome if it could read data until a string is reached. 

When I wrote a small template library for go, I couldn't use bufio.Reader
because of this, and I had to implement my own readString method. 

(see http://github.com/hoisie/gostache/blob/master/gostache.go) 

I'm facing this problem again, so I thought I'd write an issue about it.
